t:
“What's wrong?” my best friend    
asked as I broke down in tears,     
“Please tell me.”               


How do I tell him that I just returned from his funeral?
c:
I think your son had a mental breakdown after the accident, he's hallucinating. We'll keep him under observation.



#friendship #ghost #return #funeral #death #bond
